data.actual_result: Animated emojis are desynced and uneasy for the eye. Changing tab manually fixes it.
data.expected_result: Animated emojis should be synced like the Browser/PC Client.
data.short_description: Animated Emojis on Android are not synced like the PC client and requires changing tab.
data.steps_to_repro: - Post an animated emoji - Post same animated emoji
